TopicTitle: [bug or missing feature ?] locked view no more present in KSP2

Articles.Content:
In ksp 1 in the available view in flight there was the locked view, where the view is locked on the ship, and when you turn the ship you keep the same view of the ship (the ship does not rotate it's the environment which rotate)

in manual flight this view is mandatory to keep track of the axis to use, and is very useful for docking.

This view is currently not present in KSP2, if not implemented can you add it to the list of requested feature, i can't live without it , i manually fly everything in this view.

thanks
